word:
Parting Word of Courage and Confidence
I do not expect to live long. My work is nearly done…. I do not think I shall have more Testimonies for our people. Our men of solid minds know what is good for the uplifting and upbuilding of the work. But with the love of God in their hearts, they need to go deeper and deeper into the study of the things of God.  FE 547, 548629
